attributes.action: Have a fairer sytem as to Consessionary Bus Travel based on the Railcard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At the present moment, the system seems to be a little bit pear shaped.
The proposal is the following, as to consessionary bus travel.
1: A similar scheme be adopted to that of the Railcard.
2: Bus passengers whether over age of female retirement (60 at present)or disabled pay a yearly fee which could  start at £25,and be reviewed  similar to railcard, and paid to resepective district/borough or city councils.
3: Abolish off peak travel.with its introduction, similar to rail travel.
4: That at a 34% discount is given on Bus Travel at anytime of day.
5: This would also include those with the card , the chance to use a return or other bus companys money saving options.
6: This would also stop any need to account for number of journeys made by a  a bus operator, when claiming for passengers on consessionary travel.
7: Moneys raised locally , could be used to fund better pubic transport links in rural areas.
8:It also would make consessionary travel more accountable, and maybe avoid debts by bus operators in rural areas.
